title: Publico
content:
Arbesco DT is similar?

[http://new.myfonts.com/search/arbesco/fonts/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023162305/http:/new.myfonts.com/search/arbesco/fonts/ "http://new.myfonts.com/search/arbesco/fonts/")

author: jim_

comments.content: Rather than Publico it seems to me like Arbesco DT is more inspired by Bram de Does’ Lexicon.
